}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "WUBR-207GN_V01 ENG-A10-4001R RoHS" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
A label with an 00:1D:73 ('''[[Buffalo]]''') OUI is affixed to the board in the FCC photos
Multiple Wi-Fi Alliance cert. IDs - WFA6950 (12/15/2008) and WFA7319 (04/02/2009)
